title: Gregor Žugelj
text:
Gregor Žugelj (born 2 September 1991) is a Slovenian <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> who plays for St. Catharines Hrvat in the <a href="Canadian%20Soccer%20League">Canadian Soccer League</a>.
Playing career.
Žugelj began his professional career in 2009 in the <a href="Slovenian%20PrvaLiga">Slovenian PrvaLiga</a> with <a href="NK%20Olimpija%20Ljubljana">NK Olimpija Ljubljana</a>. Žugelj was subsequently loaned to the <a href="Slovenian%20Third%20League">Slovenian Third League</a> to play with <a href="NK%20Kamnik">NK Kamnik</a>. In 2011, he received a second loan spell with <a href="NK%20Bela%20Krajina">NK Bela Krajina</a> in the <a href="Slovenian%20Second%20League">Slovenian Second League</a>, and consequently signed a permanent deal in 2012. He returned to the top tier in 2013 with <a href="NK%20Krka">NK Krka</a>, and played two seasons with the club. In 2015, he played abroad in the <a href="Landesliga%20Burgenland">Landesliga Burgenland</a> with SV St. Margarethen/Rosental. 
In 2016, Žugelj returned to the 3. SNL to play with <a href="NK%20Kolpa">NK Kolpa</a>. After the relegation of Kolpa he played abroad for the second time in the <a href="Canadian%20Soccer%20League">Canadian Soccer League</a> with <a href="SC%20Waterloo%20Region">SC Waterloo Region</a> in 2018. In 2021, he continued playing in the CSL with St. Catharines Hrvat.
